class.name: UtilityAIAngleToVector3XZSearchCriterion
class.brief_description: Scores and filters based on the angle on the xz-plane between the search space node direction ([code]-global_transform.basis.z[/code]) compared to the given [member angle_to_direction_vector].
class.description: The [Vector3] XZ angle search criterion can be used to score and filter based on the angle on the xz-plane between the search space node direction ([code]-global_transform.basis.z[/code]) compared to the given [member angle_to_direction_vector].

members.member: The direction vector compare the search space node facing to.
Minimum angle in degrees. If the angle is less than this and filtering is applied, the tested node is filtered out.
Maximum angle in degrees. If the angle is more than this and filtering is applied, the tested node is filtered out.
